name: 蔡明誠
objective:
CALCULUS (II):
This course aims at developing comprehension of derivation and integral、activating capabilities of logic inference and induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content of Calculus(II)
includes:  5.5: Substitution Rule  6.Techniques of integration  7.Applications of integration 8. Series 9.Parametric equations and polar coordinates 10.Geometry of space 11.Partial derivatives 12.Multiple integrals
schedule:
Week 1-4 : Chapter 5.5: Substitution Rule,  Chapter 6 : Techniques of integration 
Week 5-7 : Chapter 7,8 : Applications of Integration, Series
Week 8-10 : Chapter 9.Parametric equations and polar coordinates 
Week 11 : Chapter 10: Geometry of Space
Week 12-14 : Chapter 11.Partial derivatives
Week 15-17  : Chapter 12.Multiple integrals
Week 18 : Final exam
scorePolicy:
In-class participation: 12.5%
Quizzes: 10%
Homework: 7.5%
Tests (not including Midterm and final exams): 12.5% 
Midterm exam: 22.5%
Final exam: 35%
